features.featureTitle: Add the user-uploaded logo image file to the frontend static assets so it is served at the exact path `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` (i.e., place/overwrite the file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`) without modifying the image content (keep the white background; do not make it transparent).
